comments:
Build: Callisto 3.2 RC1 (from update site)

1) Open Preferences > Web Services > Scenario Defaults
2) Change the "Web service type" preferences from "Bottom up" to "Top down".

Each time the value in the combo is changed, the following NPE is logged:

Created an attachment (id=39574)
patch for jst.ws.creation.ui

Added check for null serviceImpl text field in the type combo selection listener code - this is relevant for the preferences page since we do not display the serviceImpl text field there.
These defects were dropped for WTP 1.5 RC2.
Marking verified to stop reminder emails.
